headline: Equinix Prices C$700 Million of Senior Notes in its Inaugural Offering in the Canadian Market
summary: Equinix, Inc. (Nasdaq: EQIX), the world's digital infrastructure company®, announced the pricing of an underwritten offering of C$700 million aggregate principal amount of 4.000% Senior Notes due 2032 (the "Notes"), its inaugural offering in the Canadian market. The Notes will be issued by Equinix Canada Financing Ltd. ("Equinix Canada Finco"), a wholly owned finance subsidiary of Equinix, Inc., and will be fully and unconditionally guaranteed on an unsecured basis by Equinix, Inc. The offering
